Auxiliary tables associated with events

TABLE

CONTENT

Event Types

Drop-down list entries for types of events in the Events window and the Event Sets and Macros window in Customize. Event types can be added, edited and deleted in DB Editor.

Events

Event entries available for selection in Customize. New entries are added in Customize. Existing entries can be edited and deleted in DB Editor.

 

How to...

Add an entry to a table

Modify an entry on a table

Delete an entry from a table

Disable an entry to remove it from applications
